name: Sushi
description:
Sushi is a game about raw fish eating other raw fish, while fighting for their lives and homes and children and free education in a massive all out battle against natures waves of waves. Help them in this wet adventure.

Sushi is a puzzle game for the original GameBoy and can be played on the GameBoy, GameBoy Color and GameBoy Advance as well as emulators. There are three different sizes of fish, bigger fish eat smaller fish and there is the player fish. The goal is to grow the player fish to the biggest size by eating two smaller fish and then clearing the stage of all smaller fish. All fish are indirectly controlled by starting waves from the screens edges. Small fish move 3 units, medium sized fish move 2 units and big fish move 1 unit.

The game was made during the Global Game Jam 2017 within 48 hours by a team of 4 people.
